content:
How about right click the folder and select empty trash.

You might want to right click and select properties then the repair button as it sounds like either the trash folder or it's index is corrupt (1/1/70 dates) Repair will fix the index, but a compact will be needed to fix the actual folder data.

Note that a common cause of such things are system activities that interrupt the file access and write. Things like antivirus scanning, cloud syncing of the location, slow network responses when the data is on a local server or NAS or some form of streaming backup is in use.
creator: MattAuSupport

content: Thanks for the reply. I don't want to delete all the trash. I want to keep the last few months. Is that possible?
creator: keithinoz1

content:
Are you talking about a gmail pop account?

It is quite normal for many servers to auto empty the server Trash folder periodically and that can range from a few days to a month. But this would only effect people using Imap mail accounts.

If you are using a gmail pop account, it could mean you are not deleting emails off the server if emails are not put into the server Trash folder. Advise is to periodically logon to webmail account and check to see if really old emails need to deleted in order to increase the amount of quota you have on server.

How to delete messages in Trash that are eg: older than 30 days.

  • Right click on Trash folder and select 'Properties'
  • Select the 'Retention Policy' tab
  • Uncheck the checkbox 'Use my account settings'
  • Select 'Delete messages older than' and choose the number of days eg: 30
  • click on 'OK'
creator: Toad-Hall

content:
re: I can't remember my password, AOL/Verizon accounts need to use an app generated password.

You need to logon to the webmail account via a browser using normal password and then switch on 2 step verification then generate an app specific password. In Thunderbird use that app generated password for the account instead of the normal password you used to logon to server webmail account. See info: https://help.aol.com/articles/Create-and-manage-app-password

If you cannot remember the normal password, so have difficulty accessing webmail account, you should see a link - something like 'forgotten password' and follow the instructions to get access to the webmail account.

content: I just helped a person move from mac to PC with no problems, so the same should be true in reverse. My personal preference is to first install thunderbird, exit, and then use the OS's file management tool to copy the profile to overlay the default profile. That guarantees it is identical to what was on PC. Or, you could use tools>import>import from another thunderbird installation. IMPORTANT: be sure the profile on PC was created when Thunderbird was NOT running. Another option would be to copy profile to somewhere on hard drive, click help>troubleshootinginformation, scroll down to 'profiles' and click 'about:profiles, click the 'create profile' button and follow the prompts to name it and click the browse button to locate and select the profile you copied.

content:
I've finally found time to work this out for myself. Tabs are in session.json not history.sqlite. The file contains 86 null references which should have message URIs within the braces following "state": and there is a session.json.backup file, which, if it had been copied and preserved by the crash handler, would have allowed me to recover the state from the time of the crash. As soon as you restart Thunderturd, it gets overwritten.

That's 86 out of 100K+ emails that I now need to find and deal with. It is effectively an impossible task. I evidently made a bad bet with this email client. Given the impact of this data loss, it's time to reconsider.

content:
GerardoPcp04 dijo
Hola, Su consulta fue redirigida el foro en Español. Cuando abres el archivo adjunto PDF desde el Thunderbird en realidad se abre con el Microsoft Edge, este seria el problema? en ese caso es porque en el Thunderbird esta configurado como default para abrir PDF el Microsoft Edge, eso se cambia en Ajsutes->General->Archivos y adjuntos: Formato de documento portable (PDF) cambiar a "Vista Previa en Thundebird". Saludos

Ese no es el problema.

La aplicación iPrint&Scan de Brother te permite escanear documentos y tiene una opción para seleccionar el programa con el que quieres abrir el documento escaneado en formato PDF. Hace pocos dias lo podía abrir con Thunderbird y, entonces, se adjuntaba directamente en un nuevo correo para redactar. Ahora, realizo los mismos pasos y se abre el PDF en Microsoft Edge.

He estado investigando mas y esto ocurre en Thunderbird cuando quiero adjuntar el PDF en un nuevo correo.

content: Is the scan app 32 or 64-bit? Is TB 32 or 64-bit? TB is probably 64-bit, but if the scan app is 32-bit, TB must also be 32-bit for them to connect.

When the scan app sends PDF file, this happens from the Thunderbird console.

content:
There is a procedure that sometimes fixes MAPI errors like this: download and run the 32-bit installer over the existing app, choose the Advanced setup, set TB as the default email client. At the end of the install, don't run TB. Reboot the computer, then see if the scanner sends files to TB.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1307664

content: This is confusing to me. You have one account, but it is entered twice? Why delete the one that works, only to redo it? If I understand properly, the IMAP account works, and the POP account does not. Since IMAP accounts lose nothing on deleting and reconfiguring, and the POP account has never worked, you can remove both of them by - click tools>account settings - in left side bar, highlight one of the two to be deleted - then, scroll down further until you see 'Account Actions' and click there to see a menu item to 'remove account' . click that to remove - repeat above for the other account - now, both are gone and you can start over.

content:
Je pravdepodobné, že máte narušený profil Thunderbirdu. Vytvorte si NOVÝ PROFIL Thunderbirdu ako test pre kontrolu, či váš súčasný profil nie je príčinou tohoto problému. Na vytvorenie nového profilu môžete použiť odkazy v ponuke Štart - Spustiť (alebo iba WIN+R) a tu vypíšte: "thunderbird -p" - bez úvodzoviek a preverte, či problém pretrváva. Ak problém nepominie, tak sa môžete vrátiť k pôvodnému profilu tiež príkazom "thunderbird -p http://imgbank.cz/images/2015/08/20/Thunderbird_novy_profil.jpg

Ak je problém odstránený, potom si do NOVÉHO PROFILU cez "Nástroje“ - „Importovať" - „Importovať z inej inštalácie Thunderbirdu“ importujte všetky účty a nastavenia, adresáre, e-mailové správy a kalendár ... - zvolte si iba to čo potrebujete. https://imgbank.cz/images/2023/10/25/Thunderbird_import.jpg

Ak je problém odstránený, potom pokračujte v tvorbe (budovaní) NOVÉHO PROFILU Thunderbirdu. Nakoniec môžete ten STARÝ profil odstrániť.
creator: Ansamb

content: Děkuji za Váš čas a snahu poradit. Postupoval jsem podle Vašeho návodu, vytvořil jsem nový profil, jenže v něm nemám žádné zprávy, tak to není jak otestovat, tak jsem importoval e-maily ze starého profilu, a pokusil se nějaký přeposlat nebo odpovědět, chová se to úplně stejně jako ve starém profilu. Mám pocit, že když dám odpovědět na e-mail, provede se citace původního e-mailu každý řádek začíná > a nefunguje formátování, stránka se nezobrazí jako HTML ale jen text. Netuším jak to má správně vypadat když odpovídám na takový e-mail v HTML? Protože když odpovídám nebo přeposílám normální e-mail (90% mé komunikace) tak to vypadá normálně, zprávy neobsahují formátování ani HTML protože ve zprávě nejsou. A citace vypadá normálně. Pokud v nastavení klienta změním nastavení v položce - Formát odesílání- je jedno co nastavím. Automaticky HTML a prostý text Pouze HTML Pouze prostý text Adresát dostane vždy jen prostý text, bez obrázků, fungují jen odkazy v textu. Problém mám tedy někde v tom odesílání nebo přeposílání e-mailu ne ? J.
creator: 8bit

content:
Táto chyba je pravdepodobne spôsobená chybnou inštaláciou. Ak budete postupovať podľa týchto pokynov, svoj profil (e-maily, účty, rozšírenia atď.) si zachováte.

Niektoré problémy s Thunderbirdom je možné vyriešiť vykonaním čistej reinštalácie . To znamená, že odstránite programové súbory Thunderbirdu a potom znova nainštalujete Thunderbird. Postupujte podľa týchto krokov:

Stiahnite si najnovšiu oficiálnu verziu Thunderbirdu (dnes je to 115.7.0) pre Windows x64 z http://archive.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/releases/ a uložte si tento inštalačný súbor do počítača. Po dokončení sťahovania zatvorte všetky okná Thunderbirdu. Odstráňte inštalačný priečinok Thunderbird, ktorý sa nachádza na jednom z týchto umiestnení Windows. Ak sú na obidvoch miestach, odstráňte obidva: C:\Program Files\Mozilla Thunderbird\ C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Thunderbird\ Reštartujte počítač.

Teraz nainštalujte najnovšiu verziu Thunderbird pre Windows x64. Dvakrát kliknite na stiahnutý inštalačný súbor a prejdite krokmi sprievodcu inštaláciou. Po dokončení sprievodcu kliknutím na tlačidlo Dokončiť otvorte Thunderbird.

creator: middet

content:
The developers decided for some unknwon reason that it would be a neat idea to switch on threading by default. No idea why, but that explains why you have the issue.

Do this: 1. Set the default for new folders to be unthreaded via Config Editor

  • Settings > General
  • Scroll to bottom
  • click on 'Config Editor' button - It opens in a new tab
  • In search type: default_view
  • You will see this line: mailnews.default_view_flags - It will have a numerical value of 1
  • click on the 'pencil' icon on the right to allow an edit.
  • Remove the number 1 and type in a zero 0
  • click on the 'tick' icon to save your settings.

You will now have: mailnews.default_view_flags - It will have a numerical value of 0 This will now mean any new folders you create, they will not have threading by default.

2. Set Inbox to use Unthreaded.

  • Select the 'Inbox' folder for the mail account.
  • Select 'View' > 'Sort by > 'Unthreaded'

3. Now Apply the sort view to all folders in the mail account:.

  • Hover over 'Apply current view to' to see pop up list
  • Hover over 'Folders and it's children' to see pop up list
  • hover over the 'mail account name' - not a folder to see pop up list
  • finally click on the 'mail account name' not a folder.

You would need to repeat the above for each mail account.

content:
The filter log is known to have a performance issue. It has probably gotten large enough that the display fails.

You will want to start fresh - use your OS file browser to find the underlying file for that account and delete it. filterlog.html
